<h1 align='center'>Anime Tracking Website 📚⭐</h1>

<p align='center'>
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/angular-%23DD0031.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=angular&logoColor=white"/>
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/node.js-6DA55F?style=for-the-badge&logo=node.js&logoColor=white"/>
</p>

<p align="center">Web-App que permite que o usuário busque dados da API Kitsu : https://kitsu.docs.apiary.io/# </p>

<h2>Tecnologias ⚙️</h2>
<p>Backend : NodeJS , Fastify</p>
<p>Frontend : Angular , FontsAwesome , Angular Material , NG Bootstrap</p> 

<p align='center'>
  <img src='https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/82726583/384641495-ff6c9064-a08f-497a-bd2e-d4558981b41a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..efYgvUupQ9YFe0MpU_KS0FxjWj1SR95zRv5Vx4TRolQ'/>
  <img src='https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/82726583/384641497-3c4c86f9-05c0-4cde-8e0e-5cc4bd6f4cd5.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rbHPf9iwfVGSfsw1hbhk0vqi8lyiJ4u0n5c2xzWaDY0'/>
  <img src='https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/82726583/384641498-c039032f-6895-4fb3-9d3c-4e445c9728d0.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..obPe2iIkHT1gOrGC5ndLQRiBP3vQZ2um-tK8b8dvIes'/>
</p>

<h2>Getting Started 🚀</h2>
<p>git clone https://github.com/caio2983/AnimeTracker.git </p>
<p>cd anime-tracker</p>
<p>npm install</p>
<p>ng serve</p>
<p>cd backend</p>
<p>npm install</p>
<p>node app.js</p>
